description: a configuration for exporting an ipynb in ipypublish

___template.description: configuration to build a Jinja template

___module.description: the python module that the json file resides in

___file.description: the filename of the json file

___outline.description: the outline schema, containing the jinja template and schema for segments

___segments.description: segments to be inserted into the outline

___module.description: the python module that the json file resides in

___file.description: the filename of the json file

___postprocessors.description: configuration for post-processing of the stream output from the exporter

___order.description: the order of application of the post-processors, named by their entry-point

___config.description: the traitlets configuration for post-processor classes

___exporter.description: an exporter to be used by nbconvert

___class.description: the python class path for the exporter

___filters.description: the filter functions to be used by the exporter

___preprocessors.description: the preprocessor classes to be used by the exporter

___class.description: the python class path for the preprocessor

___other_args.description: additional arguments to be fed to the traitlets Config
